original: @134a * // thugs rje chen po mkha' spyod yul can la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩde nas / nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dri ma med //
analyzed: @134a * // thugs rje chen po mkha' spyod yul can la phyag 'tshal lo // de nas / nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dri ma med //
translated: Homage to the Great Compassionate One, whose domain is the sky.üîΩNow, the treatise will be explained, which begins:

original: ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
translated: The characteristic of space is immaculateness.

original: ngo mtshar bsod nams brgya yi pha rol phyin //
analyzed: ngo mtshar bsod nams brgya yi pha rol phyin //
translated: Having perfected the hundredfold wondrous merits,

original: snang dang mi snang dmigs pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: snang dang mi snang dmigs pa thams cad kyi //
translated: The object of all that is visible and invisible,

original: spyod yul las dben gcig min du ma'i tshul //
analyzed: spyod yul las dben gcig min du ma'i tshul //
translated: The domain of experience, devoid of multiplicity,

original: bde chen nam mkha' dri med thub la 'dud //üîΩdmigs pa byed pa stong phrag mang po dang // gang zhig bdag tu lta ba mi bzad pas //
analyzed: bde chen nam mkha' dri med thub la 'dud // dmigs pa byed pa stong phrag mang po dang // gang zhig bdag tu lta ba mi bzad pas //
translated: I bow to the Sage, the immaculate space of great bliss.üîΩThose whose minds are confused and who do not see the point,üîΩWho have many thousands of objects of meditation,

original: blo gros 'chal pa don ma mthong ba rnams //
analyzed: blo gros 'chal pa don ma mthong ba rnams //
translated: And who are tormented by the view of self,

original: gnas 'dir nam mkha' dri med bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gnas 'dir nam mkha' dri med bsgom par bya //
translated: Should meditate on the immaculate space in this place.

original: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gang //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gang //
translated: What is the object, what the time, what the nature,

original: ji lta ji tsam ci zhig ni //
analyzed: ji lta ji tsam ci zhig ni //
translated: What is it like, what is its extent, what is it?

original: de na de tshe de nyid des //
analyzed: de na de tshe de nyid des //
translated: There, then, at that time, that very thing,

original: de ltar de tsam de med nyid //
analyzed: de ltar de tsam de med nyid //
translated: In that way, to that extent, it is indeed nonexistent.

original: blo gros sbyangs pa rnam kun du //
analyzed: blo gros sbyangs pa rnam kun du //
translated: The mind, in every way,

original: chos kun dmigs pa med shes pa //
analyzed: chos kun dmigs pa med shes pa //
translated: Knows that all phenomena are without reference.

original: de ni yang dag lha mchog mthong //
analyzed: de ni yang dag lha mchog mthong //
translated: Is the vision of the supreme, true deity.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom.

original: hr'i: gzhan ni cig shos blo can de //
analyzed: hr'i: gzhan ni cig shos blo can de //
translated: The other, the wise one,

original: sprin bral gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings su //
analyzed: sprin bral gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings su //
translated: In the cloudless, clear expanse of space,üîΩWith the color of the moon, with lotus hands,

original: zla ba'i mdog can padma'i phyag / rjes su skye dang gzhig par bya //
analyzed: zla ba'i mdog can padma'i phyag / rjes su skye dang gzhig par bya //
translated: Should be born and destroyed.

original: dag pa'i nam mkha' ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: dag pa'i nam mkha' ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of pure space

original: bskyed pa'i rim pas gzhan gyur te //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pas gzhan gyur te //
translated: Is transformed by the creation stage,

original: rjes su gzhig pas de stong 'gyur //
analyzed: rjes su gzhig pas de stong 'gyur //
translated: And by the subsequent destruction it becomes empty.

original: bla ma'i drin thob rdo rje'i blo //
analyzed: bla ma'i drin thob rdo rje'i blo //
translated: The vajra mind obtained through the kindness of the guru,

original: mthong bas grub dang gzhig pa na //
analyzed: mthong bas grub dang gzhig pa na //
translated: When seen, is established and destroyed.

original: med ces rnam par rtog par zad //
analyzed: med ces rnam par rtog par zad //
translated: The thought, It does not exist, is exhausted.

original: rtog pa de yang dmigs su med //
analyzed: rtog pa de yang dmigs su med //
translated: That thought also is not observed.

original: byis pas brtags te gsum spyad pa //
analyzed: byis pas brtags te gsum spyad pa //
translated: The childish imagine and practice the three,

original: mkhas pas de nyid gcig mi dmigs //
analyzed: mkhas pas de nyid gcig mi dmigs //
translated: But the wise do not observe even one reality.

original: gdod nas ma skyes bskyed @134b pa'i rim //üîΩnam yang mi 'jig rjes su gzhig / de ltar 'khor gsum bzhi gsum gyis //
analyzed: gdod nas ma skyes bskyed @134b pa'i rim // nam yang mi 'jig rjes su gzhig / de ltar 'khor gsum bzhi gsum gyis //
translated: The creation stage is primordially unborn,üîΩAnd the subsequent destruction is never destroyed.üîΩIf, in that way, the three wheels are not free from observation,

original: dmigs bral grub par mi 'gyur na //
analyzed: dmigs bral grub par mi 'gyur na //
translated: The three triads are not established.

original: de tshe med dang yod pa dang // byung ba zhig pa 'ang gang zhig yin //
analyzed: de tshe med dang yod pa dang // byung ba zhig pa 'ang gang zhig yin //
translated: And what is it that has arisen and ceased?

original: rnal 'byor zab mo nam mkha' yi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zab mo nam mkha' yi //
translated: The profound yoga is the sphere of space,

original: spyod yul nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: spyod yul nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: The union with space.

original: dmigs pas phung bar gyur rnams la //
analyzed: dmigs pas phung bar gyur rnams la //
translated: For those who are ruined by objectification,

original: dmigs med ston pa ngo mtshar yin //
analyzed: dmigs med ston pa ngo mtshar yin //
translated: The teaching of nonobjectification is amazing.

original: nam mkha' dri med kyis sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: nam mkha' dri med kyis sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The SƒÅdhana of Stainless Space is complete.
